name: SARA-98A
author: Psiweapon Schuldigun
description:
This
 palette follows PC-98 specs: 16 colors in 12-bit RGB colordepth (4096 
different possible colors, R G and B values have 64 distinct steps ). I 
developed it with GrafX2 while making the sampled portrait, so it's 
meant to be used for warm-ish dithered illustrations. All three ramps 
(pink, skintone, gray-to-brown) interlock and join at the light and dark
 ends, so within their very limited colorspace they should be somewhat 
versatile.
